home.about_me_message: I am an enthusiast software developer, specialized in web development technologies. I like team work, and I feel very comfortable learning new stuff.

home.contact_me_message: If you have an idea and you think that I can add value to your team, do not hesitate in contact me.

projects.ssman_description: The maintenance request system (SSMAN by its acronym in Spanish), was developed for the maintenance department of the Social Security Institute of Tabasco (ISSET). It allows to the different areas of the Institute to generate maintenance request, to later be managed by an analyst, and turn into service orders. Also, it's capable of manage the inventory of the department.
